title: Intro-Medical Image Proc
description: A study of mathematical methods used in medical image acquisition and processing. Concepts, algorithms, and methods associated with acquisition, processing, and display of two- and three-dimensional medical imaged are studied. Crosslisted with ECE 4783.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
